"Oh? What are you doing in a place like: "Perhaps you're here to see Manon?"

"If so, she isn't here at the moment.
She's currently surveying another area."
"Is Manon doing alright?"
"Is she getting along well with the Survey Team?"
"Yes, I think she's doing just fine."
"I don't think she's having any problems fitting in."
"Even those who looked at her with doubt are starting to come around."
"I doubt they can deny the value of her contributions."

"Unfortunately, Manon herself seems to be unable
to accurately gauge the attitude of the troops."
"Though, I think that sense of unease will naturally fade as time goes on."
"By the way..."
"Do you know anything about the mysterious power she seems to have?"
"Mysterious power?"
"What do you mean?"
"Indeed. Have you... not noticed it?"
"As I thought, you seem to be unaware of it."
"I speak of the power she displayed during the fight with Nilus Stia."
"Do you remember?"
"...Just what exactly was that overwhelming power?"
"I have no idea."
"A mysterious power... I guess."

"Lately, you see, Manon has been making use of that
selfsame power quite frequently during our surveys."
"In order to save members of the survey team and others nearby."

"Thanks to her, we've been able to conduct our research without
any casualties, but there's something about it that worries me..."

"Commander Guren, too, once put himself on the front lines,
cutting down enemies to spare his troops from danger..."
"As if to fill the void in his heart that formed when he lost Hibana..."
"I'm getting that same feeling from Manon, you see."
"I think someone like you might be able to speak with her in earnest."
"When you see an opportunity, please try asking her about it in passing."
"It was nice seeing you."
